name: Junko / ジュンコ / 준코 / 淳子 (Blue Archive)
description:
Akashi Junko (Blue Archive)

赤司ジュンコ (ブルーアーカイブ) / 아카시 준코 (블루 아카이브) / 赤司淳子 (碧蓝档案)

Usage

Use any or all of the following tags to summon Junko: junko, slit pupils, demon horns, halo, twintails, hair ribbon, pointy ears, demon wings

- You can also use low wings if the wings appear too high.

For her normal outfit: military uniform, black shirt, plaid skirt, red necktie, thigh strap, black boots


For her New Year alt: japanese clothes, yellow kimono, black hakama, black skirt, black boots, kinchaku

- The hakama is often too short; try adding long skirt or including bare legs in the negative prompt.


For her normal expression: closed mouth, smile, :3

- You may need to prefix the colon with a backslash character.

- Add v-shaped eyebrows for a more smug look.


For her hangry expression: open mouth, wavy mouth, skin fang, (tearing up, crying with eyes open:0.5)

- The AI is very aggressive about drawing tears/crying.  You may need to reduce the emphasis.

Weight 1 is ideal. Adjust the weight as needed when combining with other LoRAs.

Refer to https://huggingface.co/khanon/lora-training for other Blue Archive characters, training parameters, and datasets.
